dataIdInfo.idAbs: Loads ArcProject Water Quality Profiles into the water quality database. You can use this tool one of two ways - by filling in the first table completely and ignoring the other parameters, or by filling in the WQP field of the table (by using the load button in the first option) and then checking the box to "Fill in table by parsing filename?" and specifying the

tool.name: GainToDB

param.name: wqp_files
param.dialogReference: Select as many water quality profile files as you wish to load. These files will fill in the WQP field of the table, but will not fill in the Site ID or Gain Type fields. The next option can optionally attempt to fill these fields automatically by reading the filenames and pulling the site ids and gain values from the file.

param.name: bool
param.displayname: Fill in table by parsing filename?

param.name: site
param.displayname: Part of filename with site code (split by underscores)?

param.name: gain
param.displayname: Part of filename with gain code (split by underscores)?

tool.summary: Loads ArcProject Water Quality Profiles into the water quality database.
